item.title: Advanced iPhone Development - iTunesU
item.description:
Recent search on iTunes listed the Madison Area Technical College classes on iPhone development by Dr. Brad Larson

Session on OpenGL ES 2.0 recommended by Gurus. Go and download the complete sessions fromÂ here

item.title: Download Apple WWDC Keynote videos
item.description: I was always disappointed with Apple Keynote pages. It allows you to stream and watch the videos with QuickTime which is not great for streaming and videos are not HTML5 yet. Another restriction with QuickTime is, you need to have QuickTime Pro to save the video.

item.title: Obj-C | For beginners
item.description:
A quick obj-c cheat-sheet for the beginners.

Scribd link

This is taken from RWTH-iPhone Application Programming. You can also download complete videos from iTunesU.
